backend/main.mo: IC backend actor defining pricing plans, user profiles, site settings, admin authorization, and blob storage with CRUD for pricing plans.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to modified files, components, and test IDs for deployment and verification improvements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing summarized descriptions of all frontend components, hooks, utilities, and admin panels.
frontend/.env.example: Template environment configuration for local and mainnet builds specifying DFX network and Internet Identity URL.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide outlining prerequisites, environment setup, and steps for deploying the app to IC mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Global stylesheet defining Tailwind layers and OKLCH-based color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/deploy-ic.sh: Mainnet deployment script that validates environment, builds the frontend, creates canisters, and deploys to IC with clear output.
frontend/scripts/verify-deploy.sh: Bash script that verifies IC canister deployment, checks canister status, and confirms frontend accessibility.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the LandingPage.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: UI overlay explaining lack of admin access, with different messaging depending on whether admins exist.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPanel: Full-screen admin panel with tabs for pricing, content, logo, and admin management.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminsAdmi: Admin management UI for listing, adding, removing, and copying administrator principals.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminSetup: Dialog allowing the first user to claim admin access, with success and error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/LogoAdminP: Panel for viewing, previewing, validating, and uploading a new site logo with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/admin/PricingPla: Admin interface for viewing, creating, editing, and deleting pricing plans with form validation and API mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/SiteCustom: Form-based admin panel for editing site content settings and saving updates via backend API.
frontend/src/components/landing/Footer.t: Landing page footer displaying logo, navigation links, social icons, and dynamic site settings content.
frontend/src/components/landing/Header.t: Responsive header with logo, navigation, login/logout handling, and conditional admin setup or admin access buttons.
frontend/src/components/landing/Hero.tsx: Hero section showing dynamic site settings text, background visuals, CTAs, and feature highlights with scroll animations.
frontend/src/components/landing/ScrollRe: Utility component that reveals children with a fade-and-slide animation when scrolled into view.
frontend/src/components/landing/Sections: Contains landing page components for stats, features, and pricing, pulling data from site copy and backend while rendering animated UI sections.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Displays a dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter their name and saves the profile via mutation.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserProf: Provides a modal for viewing and editing a user's profile name with success and error handling.
frontend/src/content/siteCopy.ts: Stores static marketing copy used across the landing page, including hero text, features, stats, pricing, and FAQ.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the authenticated identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, providing identity loading, login, logout, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for admin checks, admin claiming, and admin list retrieval using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and theme variables including light/dark mode color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page composition with sections and admin panel access logic based on authentication and admin status.
frontend/src/utils/siteSettings.ts: Merges backend site settings with frontend defaults to produce unified site configuration values.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins for the site's design system.
project_state.json: Records project version, requirements, architectural notes, issues, and feature tracking metadata.
